languages.text: "Мы служим панихиду по бытию, а духи механизмов дают нам воду, еду и питательную смесь. Мы благодарим их за это обрядами машинного ухода и обслуживания. Так велено великой сущностью".

"We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."
languages.original_text: "Мы служим панихиду по бытию, а духи механизмов дают нам воду, еду и питательную смесь. Мы благодарим их за это обрядами машинного ухода и обслуживания. Так велено великой сущностью".

traits.locale_text: "We're holding a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "We're holding a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「私たちはあらゆる存在の世話を徹夜で行っている。機械精霊が水や食料、混合栄養剤を与えてくれるのだ。精霊に感謝し、機械の修理とメンテナンスを行っている。大いなる存在の命によって」
languages.original_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはあらゆる存在の世話を徹夜で行っている。機械精霊が水や食料、混合栄養剤を与えてくれるのだ。精霊に感謝し、機械の修理とメンテナンスを行っている。大いなる存在の命によって」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “我们守望着所有的存在之物。机魂们给予我们水、食物与营养混合物，我们通过机器维修与保养仪式报答它们。伟大存在也命令我们这么做。”
languages.original_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: “我们守望着所有的存在之物。机魂们给予我们水、食物与营养混合物，我们通过机器维修与保养仪式报答它们。伟大存在也命令我们这么做。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Nous veillons sur l'existence tout entière, et les esprits des mécanismes nous fournissent de l'eau, de la nourriture et des nutriments. Nous les remercions en effectuant des rites d'entretien et de maintenance des machines, car telle est la volonté de la grande entité. »
languages.original_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: « Nous veillons sur l'existence tout entière, et les esprits des mécanismes nous fournissent de l'eau, de la nourriture et des nutriments. Nous les remercions en effectuant des rites d'entretien et de maintenance des machines, car telle est la volonté de la grande entité. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «Nos dedicamos a vigilar hasta el fin de nuestros días, y los espíritus de las máquinas nos proporcionan agua, comida y una mezcla de nutrientes. Se lo agradecemos con rituales de mantenimiento y servicio de máquinas. Así lo ordena la gran entidad».
languages.original_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: «Nos dedicamos a vigilar hasta el fin de nuestros días, y los espíritus de las máquinas nos proporcionan agua, comida y una mezcla de nutrientes. Se lo agradecemos con rituales de mantenimiento y servicio de máquinas. Así lo ordena la gran entidad».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Wir halten eine Mahnwache für die gesamte Existenz ab, und die Geister der Mechanismen geben uns Wasser, Nahrung und Nährstoffmix. Wir danken ihnen dafür mit Riten der Maschinenpflege und -wartung. So gebietet es das große Wesen."
languages.original_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: "Wir halten eine Wahnmache für die gesamte Existenz ab, und die Geister der Mechanismen geben uns Wasser, Nahrung und Nährstoffmix. Wir danken ihnen dafür mit Riten der Maschinenpflege und -wartung. So gebietet es das große Wesen."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Tüm varoluş için ibadet ediyoruz. Mekanizmaların ruhları bize su, yiyecek ve besin karışımları ihsan ediyor. Makine hizmeti ve bakım ayinleriyle onlara şükrediyoruz. Büyük varlık böyle emrediyor."
languages.original_text: "We hold a vigil for all of existence, and the spirits of the mechanisms give us water, food, and nutrient mix. We thank them for that with rites of machine servicing and maintenance. So commands the great entity."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm varoluş için ibadet diyoruz ve Mekanizmaların ruhları bize su, yiyecek ve besleyici karışımlar ihsan ediyor. Onlara makine hizmeti ve bakım ayinleriyle şükrediyoruz. Büyük varlık böyle emrediyor."
traits.speaker: Chief
